ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank the UC Davis Fish Culture and Conservation Laboratory staff including Luke Ellison and Galen Tigan for providing experimental Delta Smelt, and Ken Beer at the Fishery, Inc. for providing Largemouth Bass. Additionally, we are grateful to undergraduate students Emily Perry and Monica Serrano for assistance with experimental systems, fish care, and data collection, as well as several Todgham and Fangue laboratory members for assistance with tissue sampling and recording of CTMax data. We thank the CABA facilities managers at UC Davis for general maintenance of fish facilities and fish care when needed, Sheena Holley at the Department of Water Resources for generation of the SFE map, and Sarah Baird for photographs of Largemouth Bass. Lastly, the authors thank two anonymous reviewers for their comments and improvement of the manuscript.
